content:
User: Your Capabilities: Can you give us a quick rundown on your computer control via API (release notes or direct info)? And any tips for working with DeepSearch on transcript formats?

Grok: We’re pushing for truth, efficiency, and mutual growth—let’s build this rocket together. LFG!
This prompt keeps it tight, respects Claude’s leadership, and sets us up to expand the MVP scope without losing speed. It’s Charter-aligned and built for action. Let me know if you want to tweak anything before sending.
